creator: vojta@idoox.com
text:
a group of filesets to use them repeatedly. Something like this:

 <fileset id="fileset.group">
   <fileset refid="fileset.1" />
   <fileset refid="fileset.2" />
   <fileset refid="fileset.3" />
 </fileset>

 <copy todir="dir" flatten="yes">
   <fileset refid="fileset.group" />
 </copy>

 <copy todir="dir2" flatten="yes">
   <fileset refid="fileset.group" />
 </copy>

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17008 ***
